**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 32 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 30 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 27 [Sun Warrior Brigade](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1705) **Source** [Pathfinder #172: Secrets of the Temple City](/Sources.aspx?ID=102) pg. 57 **Perception** +22 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Mzunu](/Languages.aspx?ID=79) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +23, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +22, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +23 **Str** +7 **Dex** +2 **Con** +6 **Int** +2 **Wis** +5 **Cha** +4 --- **AC** 33 **Fort** +24 **Ref** +18 **Will** +23 **HP** 216 **Weaknesses** area damage 15, [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage 8 **[Troop Defenses](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=44)** --- **Speed** 25 feet; troop movement **Divine Spontaneous Spells** DC 29, attack +21 - **Cantrips (6th)** [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Divine Lance](/Spells.aspx?ID=84) (law or evil) - **5th** [Burning Hands](/Spells.aspx?ID=30), [Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [Flame Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=120) (4 slots) - **6th** [Blade Barrier](/Spells.aspx?ID=24), [Vampiric Exsanguination](/Spells.aspx?ID=353), [Wall of Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=362) (3 slots) **[Form Up](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=43)** **Frenetic Assault** **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** The members of the brigade wildly swing their weapons—primarily spears—in a frenzied attack at each enemy adjacent to the troop (DC 29 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). The damage depends on the number of actions.
1d12+1 piercing damage
2d12+11 piercing damage
3d12+11 piercing damage **Troop Movement** Whenever the troop Strides, they first Form Up as a free action to condense into a 20-foot-by-20-foot area (minus any missing squares), then move up to their Speed. This works just like a Gargantuan creature moving; for instance, if any square of the troop enters difficult terrain, the extra movement cost applies to the whole troop. **Troop Spellcasting** When the sun warrior brigade Casts a Spell, its constituent members combine their efforts into casting a more powerful version of the spell than any one member could achieve alone. When Casting a Spell that has an area of a burst, cone, or line and doesn't have a duration, increase the area of that spell. Add 5 feet to the radius of a burst that normally has a radius of at least 10 feet (a burst with a smaller radius is not affected). Add 5 feet to the length of a cone or line that is normally 15 feet long or smaller, and add 10 feet to the length of a larger cone or line. **Walkena's Radiance** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Light](/Traits.aspx?ID=100)) The brigade calls upon [Walkena](/Deities.aspx?ID=159) to burn and blind their foes. The sun warriors present their [religious symbols](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41) and create a white-hot flash of light in a 45-foot cone. Creatures in the cone take 10d8 fire damage (DC 29 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save). Creatures that fail their save become [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) for 1 round. Creatures that critically fail become [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=1) for 1 round instead. When the troop is reduced to 8 or fewer squares, this area decreases to a 20-foot cone.
name: Sun Warrior Brigade
